--- ### @mixin no-flexbox Style only when browser does not support flexbox. #### Dependencies For flexbox to work properly it uses Modernizr `.flexbox` and `.flexboxlegacy` #### SCSS {% highlight css %} .foo { @include no-flexbox { display: table; } } {% endhighlight %} #### SCSS {% highlight css %} .no-flexbox .foo, .no-flexboxlegacy .foo { display: table; } {% endhighlight %}
